object.name: transaction
object.property: <model xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="date" type="zope.schema.Datetime"> <description/> <title>Date</title> </field> <field name="account" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <title>Account</title> <values> <element>bank</element> <element>cash</element> <element>credit card</element> </values> </field> <field name="payee" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Payee</title> <values/> </field> <field name="category" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Category</title> <values/> </field> <field name="currency" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Currency</title> <values/> </field> <field name="ammount" type="zope.schema.Float"> <description/> <title>Ammount</title> </field> <field name="income_expense" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <title>Income/Expense</title> <values> <element>Expense</element> <element>Income</element> </values> </field> </schema> </model>
